With a huge crowd of people waiting for them to open well after their opening time the employees ignore everyone and keep doing whatever they are working on.  I got sick of waiting after 20 minutes and found somewhere else to spend my lunch money as did many others.  Probably won t be back to this one.  At least let people know what s going on.  They even ignored my knocking on the door.  Bye.

Man  this used to be my favorite spot near my place  but recently they have had a lot of turnover. Things just haven t been the same. I ve been told the location near campus is now the best one in Austin.

LOVE CHIPOTLE   New addition to the family right next door to Cover 3   Nice setup with a friendly staff.  What better place to get you Burrito Bowl Fix ON   I work near here and like what Chipotle can offer with the fast  friendly  service   Thanks guys for a great first impression...we will be back to order more food     By the way  they make the Guac fresh daily  D

Not much to review about Chipotle. Is anyone really checking Yelp reviews to decide whether to go   I can say it s probably the only fast food I ll eat. It s tasty  and I can feel good about it. I m always grateful I can grab something that won t kill me in a hurry  but always pissed I still have to pay  9 for only lettuce  meat  gauc and salsa.   This Chipotle always seems  new.  It s very clean  the ceilings seem higher  there is a lot of glass....the couple times I ve gone there weren t that many people there.   That s all I have to say about that  -Forrest Gump.

I m not the biggest fan of burrito s bigger than my stomach  but I was once again  dragged by a friend.  The place was really clean. Surgeries could probably be performed on the tables which looked like steel. We didn t know exactly what we wanted but the staff was still friendly  another plus.  When we got our gigantic burrito  I was happy to see that it was way better than Freebirds. All the ingredients tasted fresh and the rice  well  I could have just had a bowl of plain rice and be happy.   I can see myself coming back here  especially if someone recommends Freebirds. I can t stand that place...

It s Chipotle  which is good  but I ll keep this one simple   Me  coming in 10 minutes to close  having placed an online order   Hey  I m here to pick up my online to-go order.   Them  Hi  Are you ____   Me  Yeah  hey  I m ______.   Steven  interrupting Them   Oh man. Hey  _____. Look - we re out of guacamole.   Me  That s cool man  no guac. Not a huge deal.   Steven  It IS a huge deal to me - it s my job to make sure we have what you order  and this is my bad.   Me  Really  that s nice of you  but it s fine - you guys are great  there s no problem.   Steven  I insist you take this card for FIVE FREE MEALS here.   Me  Okay  yeah. Thank you - this is crazy. I ll be back.   Can t argue with people who care...
Best service ever. Me and my husband were there today for the first time and they were great  thoughtful and nice. I will be back a thousand times

I don t frequent Chipotle regularly  and it was my first time at this location. But I assumed a Carnitas burrito had  well Carnitas. I led with that  not really paying attention to the type of pork she put on  shredded  until I saw that it was not what the picture looked like. After arguing with me that I said  pork  I had to point out that carnitas is also pork. So maybe that is something training can go over  don t know  be more specific with the questions to customers  Or maybe just put carnitas on when they order a carnitas burrito and don t ask  Not sure which is better....Anyway  she does it over in silence. I apologizes to her  mentioning that I don t go there often  and get no response. She definitely heard me. When I get to sauces she puts the wrong sauce on...at this point I don t want to make her do it over a third time  so I just bite my lip. Apparently all this was noticed by the guy who checked me out  the manager   who without me even saying anything said  its on us.  I thanked him and left. That at least shows that there is hope for improvement and that this location isn t indifferent to its customers.  I ll come back  but not a good first impression.

Great food  love the service  many gluten free options  sometimes they undercook the rice but I can live with that... but why did they have to go and attack the 2nd amendment by banning lawful concealed carry citizens and start putting communist socialist sayings on their to go bags. If they want American dollars respect our constitution   Quote from George Saunders on their bag     Hope that  in future  all is well  everyone eats free  no one must work  all just sit around feeling love for one another.   Say what  Obama should have used that as his presidential running slogan

I love chipotle  I try to avoid this one if I can because they are the worst with the portions. I have to get double meat just to get a reasonable amount. The server actually scooped one cube of chicken out thinking she put too much in there. All in all it was a weak first scoop and about a 1 3 of a scoop on the second if I can be specific. I  like extra cheese and they sprinkle it on like Salt Bae. It s like pulling teeth to get a reasonable meal. They are usually in good spirits though

So you either like their food or not. I have been here multiple times. The pork was a bit dry and I would not eat the beef. The veggies and the chicken I definitely liked and would recommend. There is outdoor seating and the service has always been fast. If you are in a rush send in an internet order.   Speaking of which  I ordered last night and it did not come through their system. That s bad. To make up for it the manager immediately takes my order and makes it on the spot. She also throws in some free chips an guac. That makes up for it in my book. At least she admitted it was a mistake and wanted to make up for it.   They also have the option to double up on the meat. Might cost you more but they have it.

This place is miserable. I have been there maybe 15 times  and they have yet figured out how to wrap a burrito. If it s not the burrito wrap  it s that their tortillas stick together in the bag  thus the tortilla tears when you pull them apart. Since they can t figure out how to wrap a burrito  I have also tried their bowls. Everything else tastes great  yet the somehow found a way to mess up the vinaigrette. Instead of flowing like most vinaigrette s do  it was like a glob of flubber  yes  the same flubber as the Robin Williams movie  disgusting . The staff seems fine  and it seems to be a managerial problem. Instead of going here  go to the one off of Metric and Parmer  Just a little bit further but the experience will be so much better

Not sure what has been going on at this place....maybe some different management     THE SERVICE IS OFF THE HOOK WONDERFUL  The food is good and what you expect from Chipotle....but I will keep going back to this location because it is run right  The employees seem happy and eager to wait on you. Everyone greets you when you come in and you just get a good vibe. I avoided this location because I had a negative experience awhile back   but now it s completely different. Whatever you are doing keep it up management  GREAT JOB
It wasn t anything special  The burrito was ok  didn t have a big choice selection. It looked like stripped down version of freebirds.
Definitely good food. I sadly don t have one close enough at home so this is a nice treat when traveling. The location is clean and good service. Great food too

This review is less about Chipotle as a whole and more about this specific shop.  You either like the food or don t.  Personally I m a fan.  The restaurant is always clean  and the associates are friendly and keep the line moving.  The manager must be doing a good job because everyone seems happy to be here and I ve never had a negative experience.  Only Cabo Bobs is as good as this Chipotle   Nice job guys  keep it up

I hate burritos with a passion. They are ridiculously big and there is just too much rice and too many beans and not enough flavor. Yet  I love Chipotle s burritos and burrito bowls. No matter the overwhelming number of ingredients I get them to shove into a burrito  they wrap it up perfectly. They make it quick and easy to order. They are still huge  but the other half is delicious the next day. The burrito bowls are enough for three meals  which is such a steal. Having access to healthy  if you order right   natural ingredients in a fast-food place amazes me.

I write this review out of spite.  I know that there is no small business owner whose feelings I can bruise  no Mr. Chipotle who ll text me  begging me to rescind my harsh feelings.  So I feel free to unload.  MY FEELINGS ABOUT THE VILLAGE CHIPOTLE  1  It s taken months  but they re finally getting the idea of what an adequate portion of meat is supposed to be.  Did you see the sad look in my eyes  miss   Did you then see the small lump of barbacoa sitting in the tortilla   CAUSATION CORRELATION  2  Did they just stop constructing it   Seriously  they opened before they were done with the walls  and now I m beginning to think that there are parts of the inside that are intentionally being left undone.  Maybe I m overrating it and it s been done for months and I just never noticed.  I DON T ALWAYS NOTICE THINGS  3  This is a system wide thing  but it especially counts here-- why am I paying you  1.50 for a little pat of guacamole   Hell  I M NOT EVEN THE ONE PAYING YOU  I m just picking it up for my coworker.  I don t LIKE guacamole   But you insist on charging for it  bringing his burrito up to  8ish   WHY    Moreover  why did you tease me several times by not charging for the guac   You know you can do it  YOU KNOW YOU CAN SO JUST DO IT I AM NICE AGGGGGH.  But don t worry  I get my passive aggressive revenge every time my coworker gets charged for the guac by filling my water cup with Coke.  HAH   4  God  the parking situation out there sucks.  Why does Obee s get so many spaces   5  I like burritos.

I used to work at Austin Catering  in the same building complex as this Chipotle  so I ate here.....ummmm.....every single day.  The food was always good  but it was this Chipotle that made me stop ordering the guac.  EVERY SINGLE DAY it was BROWN    I would go in at 11 am  right at opening time  and the guac would just look gross and slimey.  The people that work there were pretty annoying to me.  The main guy that usually started your order was always very hyper and in a hurry.  He would throw rice in my bowl  sling the beans all over the side  and slide my bowl down to the other person.  It would piss me off every time  cuz at 11 am  I was usually the only person there   Slow the hell down  and stop making a mess with my food  The manager was pretty friendly  but in a fake douchey way.  There were like 3 really nice girls there though that counteracted the douchey-ness of the guys.  Also  this place got STUPID PACKED at lunch time.  Line out the door  nowhere to sit  stupid.  Also  the way they have the seating arranged is not really helpful in that situation.  They have like 5 or 6 long bars  and people usually don t want to sit next to or across from strangers while they eat.  When I ve gone in there and seen that the only seats were at the bars  I ve gotten my order to go.  And without the option of the stools  there is only like 5 or 6 normal tables  plus outdoor seating.   It was great when I was working just a few doors down  but I would not voluntarily go here on my days off......just not that great.

I waited a few months to review this Chipotle  enough time for them to iron out the kinks.  In this area of Austin you really can t beat the convenience  price  and quality that Chipotle provides.  For a while I tried to switch over to the burrito bowl  but being the fat dude that I am came running back to the burrito proper.  Just a word to the wise  the veggie burrito with the works is almost 900 calories...I don t even want to know what it is if you add meat in.  In the short time that this Chipotle has been open I have won burritos for four twice.  I love this location.

this particular chipotle location is the twilight zone.  if you are GLUTEN FREE  do NOT frequent this location.  they are very rude and I have even been mocked for asking them to change gloves so as not to contaminate my food with gluten.  chipotles are usually really good about accommodating dietary restrictions safely  but this one does not.  it sucks.  the food has seemed below par here too lately  but the service has been bad enough alone to never return.
Not great but not bad tex mex if in a hurry.

I am probably Chipotle s best customer. Not just at this location  but at all locations across Austin. They should probably hire me as a quality assurance tester. If anyone eats at Chipotle more than me  they probably have mental issues. The main reason I love Chipotle is because of the way that they season their meats. From the chicken to the barbacoa  its all delicious. Surprisingly  they also serve up a solid margarita. Fairly strong too.
Nice clean place. Seating arrangements are awesome. Food is healthy. Customer service is fantastic. What else you need.
Fresh Guac at anytime you arrive   Quick and good chicken. What else to say.....it is chipotle.

Quick  efficient and I can get a nice amount of protein with some hot salsa. But other than that  it costs me as much as a sit down place and I have that regretful taste in my stomach afterwards  kind of like after eating fast food.

Legit.  Burritos with everything you could possibly want or need.  Great quality  great variety  and affordable prices.  The staff is always authentically Austin  even though its a chain .  The best thing to do is to get the monster size and save the other half for another meal.  It just makes sense.

Good afternoon.  Today my boyfriend and I went to the location above for lunch.  Normally  we go to the location downtown on Congress Ave. and always get good service there.  Today at the above location  not so much.  We both ordered salads and we got very little lettuce  cheese and meat  basically  very little of everything .  We both added guacamole and received about 2 tablespoons and when we asked for a litlle more the lady gave us attitude and said she would have to charge for a double serving.  I don t mind paying the  2 extra for the guacamole because I like it and order it everytime but I would like to taste it.  For  2 I can buy 4 avocados and make a big bowl of guacamole.  Again  I don t mind paying for it because I am a loyal customer but I would like to get what I pay for.  Normally  I don t complain but this is the second time we have left this location still hungry.

Where is my Chipotle from Northern VA      I realize I m in Austin  the tex-me mex capital of the country  but still I expect CONSISTENCY with Chipotle. I LOVED me some chipotle when I lived in VA  must have gone to at least 8 different branches  as I worked from the road a lot. But this Austin store sold short of what I got back home. In context  this store needs to STEP IT UP  Every component was just  off.  Gone was the  wow  factor  and the portions flavors just did not deliver the  O  factor for me. Still a pass though.

I went to this Chipotle instead of the one at 183 and MoPac but was disappointed. I hadn t had Chipotle in months and was really craving it but my burrito was really salty. Almost to the point that it was not edible. My boyfriend s was the same way. We think it was the chicken that was the problem. Next time I ll try the 183 and MoPac location.
very quick  never too crowded. Unfortunately I often go somewhere else because I circle forever looking for a place to park. Bummer

I don t like this locations....  The staff here is rude and gave me weird looks when I asked for a burrito with just Beans and Rice and unlike all the other chipotle locations charged me for a vegetarian burrito instead of two sides... Seriously If i wanted to pay 7 bucks for beans and rice well... anyways you wont find me going to this location ever... I was livid.

This location has over-the-top great service.  I live in the neighborhood  so I go regularly because the food is great  the restaurant is clean  and the service is so friendly and attentive.  I also recently tried out their catering service for a teacher appreciation luncheon at my kids  school and it was even better than I expected.  The set-up was easy and the food was as good as in the restaurant.  Hooray for General Manager Chuck and his great crew

Two doors down from the dreaded -  amp  dreadful - Shabu  See my review of 8 - 6 -14  is Chipotle. If you want a deal  amp  not an ordeal  check it out. My husband  amp  I decided to give it a try after watching a documentary about it on Netflix.  Yes - a whole doc  not a commercial.  This is the way a business should be run. Good quality  locally sourced ingredients  amp  an option to  have it your way   but Chipotle is no Burger King. I was after a Paleo-friendly meal - low starch. Figure the odds in a Tex-Mex place  But despite the fact that we walked in during the peak of the lunch hour  the manager took the time to explain the best way to get what I was after  Opt for the Burrito Bowl w out the corn  beans or rice. In addition  he brought me a sample of each of the 4 meats they offer on the line. As it turned out I got the Veggie Bowl  bc the guac looked so good  -  amp  it WAS  -  amp  came w  the Veggie. It s a paid-for extra on the meat versions.  Next time I get the BB w  chicken.  We were very satisfied w  our lunch  amp  we each ate for under  7  In addition  all the line servers were courteous  amp  looked happy to be there. In the end I went home w  a card that gave a complete nutritional profile of every menu item  amp  another card for people w  food allergies  amp  gluten sensitivity. One word of caution. If you want ambiance  go someplace else  bc Chipotle just isn t that kind of restaurant  but it fills my criteria  Good  cheap  fast  amp  a lot. Ya can t beat that.

My to go restaurant if I cannot pick a restaurant. The quality stays the same. I .have had like two bad experiences out of the hundreds of times I have gone. This location has a lot of sitting areas and is pet-friendly  and it is usually not that full.

tl dr - don t order online  I ordered on their app for pickup on Monday at 5 40 pm to avoid waiting in line. I got there at 5 55 pm  thinking I d give them a little extra wiggle room  and they still didn t have my order ready. The app said my order would be ready on the pickup shelves  but their pickup shelves were empty  all the orders were sitting unorganized at the front. It probably would ve been faster for me to just wait in line. There were about 6 other people waiting for online orders as well. I didn t get my food until 6 05 pm. The disappointment continued when I saw the size of my burrito. It looked so much smaller than what I m used to getting from Chipotle. Because of this  I don t recommend ordering online here. The food is good  but better to wait in line and watch as they make your order to ensure you re not getting ripped off.
Not enough people working. No customer service. The person who rang me up looked miserable and hates her job. Unfortunately this is the times were living with where millennials do not want to work.

I usually go to this location without any issues but placed a pick up order via the Chipotle app. When I got home and opened the bag  the burrito seemed 1 3 of the usual size. Mostly tortilla and barely any filling.  Look at the photos for reference. Barely my fist size.   Someone needs to QA these before they re sent out. This is just sad.   I made another meal after this since this did not fill me.

I placed an order for a specific pick up time since I only have a 30 minute lunch. Was the wrong order. Not a big deal. But then instead of fixing my order they continued to make other pick up orders as I stood there and waited. Now I asked for a refund instead since I m not even going to have time to eat. Which can apparently only be done over the phone. Spoke to the manger no apology. Didn t seem to care and I ended up being late back to work and didn t get to eat.

It s 4pm on Sunday  store doesn t close till 10pm  and the first line guy said they are out of black beans  steak  and they were out of corn salsa. I understand if you are short staffed and having a hard time. Completely understand it s not the employees fault  but he was so deliberately rude and unaccommodating to everyone. You re out of every other item for the next 6 hours
Slow as molasses. Terrible customer service. Literally add 30 minutes to your online order time because it will not be ready.
Slow  2pm  they have 1 person working at the counter. It takes 30 minutes to get through the line.
10 10 very neat and organized. Michael had great customer service. They were quick and neat with my food. Fresh and quality food

one of the worst customer service experiences out of any chipotles  the server Elisabeth I believe  was super rude  short with my order and very defensive when I asked her to serve me the correct portion amount as I have literally a 1000 times before  the manager had to step in to correct her  then as I turn away to pay for the order  she purposely pours an overfilled scoop of sour cream  drenching the entire tortilla  foil and counter top  digging all ten fingers into my burrito fumbling the content that was now completely unwrappable due to not applying common sense. This was rude and inappropriate  I canceled my order and requested a refund  but still can t believe how the employee reacted when I simply asked to receive the correct portion amount. Obviously not a big deal but would not visit this location again.
The food has always been good. But this location specifically gives the absolute smallest bowls. It s been a consistent problem especially for the price.

This is by far my favorite location the past few times I ve gone to chipotle. The worlds friendliest staff. Make for such a good experience that you don t even realize you needed after a long day. I hope the managers really appreciate their employees and recognize the solid crew at this location.

Y all. I love Chipotle. I ve gone to this location multiple times and not been dissatisfied. But I ordered delivery from their website and it was the worst. Everything was gross  the rice was clumped like it s been sitting for too long in water without stirring.  In our order we asked for specific things  and even contacted the store to make sure it was in our order. They messed up almost everything and forgot items that was ordered through the website. The driver spent 20 minutes at another location  with our food just sitting in the car  and showed up almost an hour later after it was picked up.  All our food was sideways in the bag  the chips were a joke  almost burnt.  In all honesty  just go in and make sure what you re getting what you want  don t rely on them making their delivery orders correct.

So I ordered lunch via the app. Requested a full portion of chicken and full portion of steak with brown rice  black beans  fajita veggies  quac  sour cream  cheese  corn salsa and lettuce. This should ve made one hell of a burrito bowl. What I got was 5 grains of rice  10 beans  10 strips of lettuce  12 kernels of corn  half the meat  a few shreds of cheese  little guac and a little sour cream. It all fit in the bowl with room to spare.  This is a total croc of shit for what I paid   I will never again order from this hole.

I appreciate Chipotle being open  but I m super disappointed with my online order. I ordered two burritos and chips and salsa and I was super excited to eat it. Got home and opened it up and there was literally a huge tear in the middle of my burrito. How can you not see this when wrapping the burrito  It s super hard to miss. I would have been cool if they included a tortilla on the side. But I didn t get anything  just a torn and messy  burrito  my husband did not enjoy his chicken burrito. He had maybe 4 pieces of chicken in his chicken burrito. Food was cold and not very flavorful. Will not be going back to this location again.

I eat at Chipotle pretty regularly and typically you get what you expect - a decent burrito or bowl  chip quality definitely is hit or miss  crispy and slightly tangy or stale and bland with giant wads of salt scattered around . The food can be tasty  fresh  and hot if you stop in at the right time and for what you pay I think you get your money s worth.  Unfortunately  my bowl earlier this week gave me some of the worst food poisoning I have ever experienced in my life  salmonella based on my symptoms . I don t know if I should be surprised - I ve seen important food prep hygiene go out the window at this location when they re busy - whether it s smearing random burrito ingredients all over the prep surface then into whichever tub is close by or onto the floor  gloves touching a bunch of different surfaces  cross-contamination here and there  the team needs some retraining. In any case  my trip earlier this week left me violently ill. I ll spare the details on what that precipitated out of my body  but I ve lost a few pounds and am retaining food for the first time in about 4 days. Thanks Chipotle - I ll be taking a break from the chain and this location for a good bit.
The service was good but the food was too salty. I buy from there all the time and usually I don t have any issues

Tried the new carne asado bowl  the meat was flavorful. The place was clean and busy upon opening. Customer service is up to par  they recognize their regulars.  Veterans Day deal  buy one get one free for military service members  veterans and military spouses.
I mean  do I even need to say anything  Everyone knows this place is amazing. So quick  easy  and it always delivers on flavor.

All the good things   Super close to my office so I come here often. Their staff is so nice  customer service is on point at this location. Their meat selections are always fresh  and the guac is always good .. unlike some other locations where their guacamole has that funky smell and taste  its always very tasty here.   I just went in to get some lunch for myself and my coworker  and I had tried to play their online game earlier to get a BOGO offer  but for some reason I never actually received the text offer  but they honored it anyway  Yay

I love that it s nestled in the corner of a shooping center. It s Saturday evening and it s not crowded at all. Friendly and fast service. Not to mention FROZEN MARGARITAS  which I ve never seen at any chipotle ever  Thoroughly impressed. Huge scoop of chicken. Belly happy.
I order from here all the time and it s usually good. The chicken usually has some weird tasting parts in it sometimes. Other than that it s good.
Messy burrito that s unevenly stuffed and rolled. Struggling to bite it without losing half of it every time. Gritty barely warm queso. Chipotle is gross. Go to Freebirds.

So I came here with my girlfriend who is a veteran to do the bogo deal they have for Veterans Day. HUGE MISTAKE. They overcharged us twice and they charged me for queso and they didn t even do a quarter of a spoon. They charged my friend for guacamole and he didn t even ask for any or get any. The lady at the back was super rude and rolled her eyes when I asked her for extra cheese after she had put less than they normally do on. The cashier was incompetent and blamed the machine for overcharging us and refused to work with us. Chipotle is expensive and this was a completely unsatisfying experience
Worst  11 I ve spent in awhile. Ordered meal was nothing like advertised on the app. Will not be ordering from this location again.  Online order via chipotle app
Gotta love chipotle    The workers were very nice  they served good portion sizes and everything was very clean.  Bunches of tabasco sauces so that was awesome.

This Chipotle never disappoints. Ingredients are fresh  never had a problem. They are consistent and service is quick great. Some Chipotle locations in Austin tend to skimp on portion  especially with burrito and bowls. This one does not. Come here

This place is one of many franchise locations so my review is more about the service and friendliness of the staff. The food was good as always and now they have gone  Non-GMO  for those of you who are into all the small print stuff. There was a HUGE line in front of me at lunch time on a rainy day and I got to order my food and get put of this place within the next 10 minutes. I could have sworn there were at least 17 people in front of me so I would have to say that this place really knows what they re doing as far as staffing and they are also very friendly and welcoming.

I ve been meaning to write this review for over a week but I m just getting around to it.  I have to say the Manager at this location is an outstanding example of First Class customer service.  I m vegetarian and went in one evening and they had run out of the tofu based option and guacamole.  I was so hungry and had been craving Chipotle but was sad when I was going to have a basic bowl with no sofritas or guacamole    however the Manager saved the day and started making me fresh sofritas.  I had to wait and he even made me a fresh bowl after. He went above and beyond and I will continue coming to this Chipotle always.

Every time I come to this chipotle I leave in a better mood. They are so nice and treat customers like their friend. The management is doing something right here.   I normally have my wallet on me and if I don t I always have emergency cash at the bottom of my purse. Well on this specific day I didn t. I was with a friend and told her I would transfer her the money so she could pay for my meal  but the cashier said it was on the house. What an awesome gesture.   Since that day anytime I go to Chipotle  I go to this location. On another occasion I ve had someone give me a drink because the lines were really long.   Thanks for being so nice every time I come

I love Chipotle. If there was one closer to my apartment then I would be in serious trouble. I m a creature of habit and get the same thing every single time. Burrito bowl  brown rice  no beans  ick    chicken  mild salsa  sour cream  lettuce  cheese  amp  a bag of chips to eat my bowl with. The price has gone up over the years but it s still delicious so I keep coming back. Great customer service at this location. They re always quick and efficient. If you dress in costume on Halloween you get half off your burrito  and I recommend playing all the Chipotle games and entering the contests because they give out a lot of buy one get one free coupons.

I can tell this location is buying low quality ingredients and I m really dissatisfied. I don t want to speculate about why they cut back  but the low quality chicken  lettuce  and beans were very obvious to detect by texture  color  and flavor.

I am dissatisfied because the quality of my food and the service I received. My rice was bland with no flavor I could tell the rice was old because the cilantro was no longer green. My chicken had no flavor it tasted like unseasoned chicken. The employees were as medicore as the food. As I walked in they were using drink cups to build a pyramid  and they put them back when we started walking up to the line. That s unsanitary as well as them not washing there hands. They also ate lemons on the line. This was about 6 24 when they began to eat the limes.

This was my first Chipotle experience and it wasn t that great. Definitely not something I would buy again unless there were no other options. I did like that there were frozen margaritas. Otherwise  the food was nothing to phone home about.

I go here so often. I LOOOOVEEEEE CHIPOTLEEEE. CHIPOTLE IS MY LIFFFFFFEEEEE That little kid vine is 100  accurate.   a href   redir url https 3A 2F 2Fwww.youtube.com 2Fwatch 3Fv 3De56MuzEGZm4 amp s 9f2642a7d8fa0df127698f05ad921b48de4851e1d849fb719e183d26c5a562aa  rel  nofollow  target  _blank  youtube.com watch v e56M   a    I wish the chiptopia would last longer though.   Friendly stafff  quick service  and tastey food. What else can I ask for

Valentine saved the day. We were the turds that came in right before closing. He hooked it up with fabulous service and a smile... even though we were turds. Been back since d he is still awesome. Always have a tummy ache the next day but worth it.

Chipotle Employee here tried to not fully honor corporate coupon.  Chipotle recently sent out a mass coupon mailing  including the following coupons   One free Burrito  Burrito Bowl  or Order of Tacos  One free Chip  amp  Salsa with any order  cannot combine coupons of course.    There is no written limit on the coupons therefore corporate did not intend for there to be a limit  meaning  if you want 6 orders of meat in a bowl  it s included in the coupon.  When sending mass coupons  companies impose limits if they believe they will need limits  these coupons are thought out and every word is intentional  they are also programmed into Chipotle s checkout system with the specific code on the coupon  so if there were a limit  the coupon would not only say it  it would show up in the system.  My apartment complex had a mass mailing of these coupons and my friends gave me theirs if they were not interested in going  so I have used a couple before this coupon and have not had any issue getting 3-4 servings of meat and guac before.   The employee said  people are abusing these coupons  there s a limit of two meats and the other meats will be sides and you ll have to pay for them.  I informed her that she s incorrect and that the coupon has worked for more than 2 meats before  I explained that a side order would not be included in the bowl  it would have to be outside the bowl to be considered a side  since the bowl contained all of the meats it is not in any way a side order.  The manager  I believe   came over and corrected the employee promptly  though it seemed that the manager instructed the employee to do this and only corrected it because I was complaining.   I don t think Chipotle s corporate HQ would appreciate not honoring their coupons  especially considering it s a PR campaign to bring people back to Chipotle after having multiple foodborne illnesses.   I also don t understand the logic  as this is not a franchise- the individual stores are not directly affected by having extra meats in a bowl.  The employees have no reason or right contention regarding Chipotle s coupons  it makes no sense.  Get a grip  Chipotle.

I admit i was little afraid on eating at this place with the health scare but this place was good  we got the bowl and it was really good the staff was nice the only thing the tortillas were chewy  the inside of the restaurant was nice and the menu board was easy to read   and the prices are reasonable  they do sell Margaritas - served from  a machine and they do have beer as well  we will be back

If I could give negative  stars I would my pregnant  girlfriend  wanted chipotle  so bad and literally there was hardly any rice in her bowl and the chicken  was gummy  for some reason not only that she found a bone in the chicken definitely  will not ever be going back so upset about our experience

Not sure what s wrong with people who reviewed this location earlier. I saw one review complain about a lack of queso and a  meal  option    Anyways  I eat here about once a week and never have any complaints. If you have had Chipotle before you know what to expect. This location is one of the best and I have no reservations about recommending this one. The food is high quality  tastes great  and is priced right. I love the steak and always get that or half and half with chicken. The guacamole is the best I ve had anywhere and is a must have.   The staff here is always very friendly and never skimp out in portions. Newsflash for the people complaining about some of the staff not portioning out enough food  you have a mouth. If you want some more just ask and they ll happily oblige.
This is the one Chipotle place I come to regularly  as the service and food quality is consistent and tasty. Thanks for keeping me on my Chipotle chicken burrito bowl addiction

I have been a longtime fan of Chipotle. Having grown up in the Northern CO area where it originated  I ve been going there for nearly 2 decades. It is my  comfort food  and the place I go when I m sick and nothing else sounds good.   Which brings us to why I m writing this review. Earlier this week I stumbled into this Chipotle after having just been released from the hospital  ie  I was sick and wanted my favorite comfort food . I was totally out of it  but I always order the same thing so even though I was mumbling  they got the idea and fixed me up my perfect burrito. The woman who was driving me home from the hospital had never been to a Chipotle and I was too sick to give recommendations  so despite a line  the guys  amp  gals behind the counter patiently helped her figure out what she wanted. Basically  the two of us held up the whole line  were less-than-ideal customers  and I wasn t even conscious enough to be more than a little bit polite. We got to the register and I m fumbling with money  when the person there just said  it s on us today.    It took a few moments for that to sink in and and when it did I could have just melted with relief. On a day when everything had gone wrong  a couple of people at a Chipotle took the time to notice and be kind. It meant a lot.  I have always been a loyal Chipotle customer  and it s not just because the food is amazing. It s because of moments like these. Time after time I ve seen the employees reach out and do nice things for others. This time  I just happened to be on the receiving end of it and I couldn t be more grateful. So thanks  Chipotle  for making my bad day so much better.   PS- my friend absolutely loved the burrito bowl they helped her pick out and I m quite sure you ve earned yourselves yet another loyal customer

Let me say this 1st  I love Chipotle  I could eat it everyday     ....but not here.  They were cheap on their portions  amp  the girl with the hat  amp  the piercings was very rude and did not even say thank you.

I guess Chipotle will do in a pinch. The service is fast and the food is fine.  It s not like this is anyone s favorite restaurant or anything. It s a place you go to get sustenance when you need it quickly.  So if you think to yourself   I am hungry and I want something quick and moderately healthy and I don t want to think about it very hard  that  s probably a good time to go stuff your gaping mouthhole with some all-natural  organic  cage-free  gluten-free  buzzword  buzzword  biodegradable  buzzword  Chipotle food stuffs.

I used to avoid this store due to the incompetent manager  but since they ve removed him the store has improved. As much as I appreciate the speed of the employees  being asked if this is for here or to go 8 times from the beginning of the line to the cashier is a bit of an annoyance.

My husband and I stopped by this store tonight after our long drive from San Diego  CA. We were greeted by such a friendly guy and we began talking to 3 employees about things to see while we were visiting. It was such a refreshing trip for food after traveling. Of course the food was great as a bonus to the great people working there  Two thumbs up from us.
Best and easy access to healthy food  Worth the money and this branch in particular is always crowded. It is kept clean and good service. Although they should incorporate free wifi into there branch.

Zero tolerance for places that serve food making their workers come in sick. Nobody wants to buy food from someone who s coughing  sneezing  runny nose  watery eyes  and looks like they are dying. Now were stuck with food we can t eat. What a waste of money. With all the regulations around cleanliness  how can you clearly not see how much of a health hazard this is   Zero stars for selling food you can t eat.
Hands down worst borritto I ve ever had.  The staff could not have cared less.  The woman simple wadded  my borritto into a ball.  0 stars if i could.

Not a good location for Celiacs. I ve been eating at Chipotle successfully for years after my Celiac diagnosis until today. I said I have a food allergy at the beginning so she changed her gloves  then proceeds to throw it down the line to someone who didn t have new gloves. They changed after placing hands all over and inside the bowl and gave me a salsa that was pre made. Well   ended up sick immediately  What a bummer  this was always an easy go to.

My friend and I ate lunch there yesterday. We got the burrito bowl with half chicken and half beef. We both spent the rest of the day throwing up and stomach upset. Called the Manager who instead of apologizing was extremely rude. All I wanted was to let them know so they could check what was wrong so more people don t fall sick. But oh well...take your chances in that place. This was the Arbor Walk location just fyi

Why are you doing this to me   What have I ever done except love you and come to you every week and give you money    When others praise Freebird s I always stick up for you.   - ....  The past 4 times I ve been to this particular Chipotle they have made my chicken burrito extra tiny and wrapped carelessly.  Wrapped isn t even the word for it.  It s folded and smushed into some foil.  The lettuce is all over the place  when you bite into it  there are areas of tortilla that when they wrap it  it overlaps onto itself so it s super thick with tortilla and you hafta peel it away but when you do it undoes itself like a sweater with loose yarn. I know it s gonna overlap  but how they managed to wrap it to where it s like 5 layers of tortilla from one damn tortilla is beyond me.   I m happy I m alone when eating Chipotle b c it s the most unattractive  messiest thing ever.  Hands-behind-the-back pie eating contests are carried out with more grace.   I need a new Chipotle to go to.

I have been wanting to try Chipotle because I love burritos and hate Freebird World Burrito so I wanted to check out the competition.  Gross.  The steak was bland  chewy and indelible.  The burrito was the shape of a cheese burger  there was nothing cylindrical about it.  The rice was bland  the hyped guacamole was brown and nothing was evenly distributed.  I had two bites and tossed it.  As much as I don t care for them  I will have to say Freebird is better.  I can say the staff was pleasant and the restaurant was clean.  We got there 30 minutes before closing but staff was fresh and polite.  Too bad the food wasn t.

I stepped on the scale this morning and lost three pounds. You know what that means  I am compelled to sabotage it with a trip to an eatery where I can order up 1 000 calories in one meal. I m talking about big-hunking burritos. I m talking Chipotle.  I am normally not a fan of Chipotle. Of all the big-hunking burrito chains  this one ranks pretty low on my list already for several reasons I won t get into here. But mainly  they just do not offer a big enough variety for my taste.  However  as it turns out today I was running an errand at the Arbor Walk and decided to buy my lunch at this Chipotle location. I figured since I ran 4 miles this morning and was heading to the office for who knows how long on a friggin Sunday  I should get something substantial to tide me over until my dinner of  most likely  beer while laying on the couch watching the Olympics.  Honestly  I really think I m going to keep off that three pounds...   When I walked in  the girl was staring off into space and someone had to point me out to her. After reading other reviews  this seems pretty normal at this location. I asked for the small size burrito while indicating the size with my hands cupped in half-moon shapes connected at the fingertips  same as the international symbol for  may I have a small side of ranch dressing  . The lady behind the counter and I went a couple of rounds of  we don t have smaller  and I thought she couldn t hear me because the music was so G.D. loud in there  and then I realized I am thinking of the Freebird s option  they have multiple sizes . So I was fine with their size. Not a big deal.  She asked me if I wanted beans and rice. I said black beans  no rice. So she pulls out the tortilla and I see her scoop up the rice and I said  no rice please  just beans.  She evidently did not hear me from the loud-ass music they re playing in there as if to mask the fact that their service is lax  so I raised my voice and said  NO RICE   My loudness and the context of what I said made me stop and think how ridiculous this place is.   I went down the line and chose my fillers. She asked me if I wanted guacamole and mumbled something. I said   yes  but what did you say   She said there is an extra charge  thinking it s probably like 50 cents or something small. I said that s fine. At the cash register  the guy who d pointed me out to the space cadet earlier rang up my total of  9.09. WTF  For a burrito and a soda  I found out that dollop of guacamole cost  1.50    I was like   This place is ignorant   I know  I know - I was the one paying for it  but I walked out thinking that I could buy an avocado for less and mash it up and put it in the burrito myself. A dollar fifty for guacamole is highway robbery if you ask me. Does your guacamole make me poo gold  Chipotle  I guess we ll have to wait and see.   I am giving them an extra star because of their little story on the side of the soda cup about Wes Jackson and his revolutionary achievements in agriculture. I bet he gets his guac comp d.

I know what you re thinking  seriously   a chipotle review   umm..    but I felt obliged to review this location as I visit this particular location so often   I definitely enjoy this location s patio  amp  proximity to shopping joints such as dsw  amp  marshall s.  only con is lunch time traffic in this shopping center  but it s manageable.

Raymond was awesome. Very polite  and politically correct with wishing me  happy holidays   made the best damn salad I ve ever had at chipotle. Shout out to the person that made the dressing today. It was on point.  I m giving this review five stars because of the service provided by Raymond  however I d like to say that Julio was horrible. Rude to not only me and my boyfriend  but all his coworkers around him. After being called up to the register for cash  he came up after the second or third time being called  during lunch hours   said  what cash   Even though I was very obviously ready to pay  and went to the back with a smirk. After I asked him his name he tried to explain his rudeness to me by saying he had been arguing with his coworkers all day. Very unprofessional and unpleasant experience with Julio.  I ve worked in customer service for years  I understand what it s like to not get along with a coworker  but it s never a good idea to display it to the consumer. To management  I hope you correct this situation between the two employees  Raymond would do very well at the Anderson Location  they are all very polite  and are always trying to put a smile on people s faces. To Julio  I don t mean this to offend you  I just hope it helps as constructive criticism so you can keep moving forward. To Raymond  great job man and keep up the positive attitude.

One of the best Chipotle s I have been to    Their meat is seasoned very well   They get you out fast  without wrapping a burrito sloppy during lunch rush It s in the Arbor walk  So you can shop until you re hungry then BAM Chipotle  I m a fan

I realize I m reviewing a chain restaurant in Austin.  Okay  now that that s out of the way - let s be real.  They have failed on the most basic and quintessential element of a great burrito - wrapping.  I can t tell you how many times I have been here  ordered a burrito  and started to eat it only to find that it starts to fall apart after the second bite because the person who put it together was completely inept.  I brought home a burrito today only to find that it had been loosely put together to where the foil didn t even reach around the sides   It might be okay if I had ordered something with double meat or an extremely large burrito  but unfortunately  that wasn t the case.  Burrito insides everywhere.   firstworldproblems

This isn t a review of Chipotle chain as a whole  instead the focus is this particular instance of the Chipotle object.    Here s what s bad about this one  Never any salt on the chips Cheap with the meat Cheap with the rice Cheap with the beans Diet Dr. Pepper is always super freaking foamy Chicks behind the counter don t understand  No guacamole  even though its the same in English or Spanish so no freaking telling what their native tongue is  The good  awesome bathroom if you re in dire need of one at Arbor Walk  Its a sad state for a Chipotle if they re getting their socks handed to them during the yuppie lunch rush hour by a mediocre buger joint with horrible fries next door.  Yeah  I m bitter that this is the closest Chipotle to both my work and home  and somehow repeatedly forget how disappointing it is until I ve crossed the point of no return.  Save yourself the pain  bypass this one and go to Lakeline  45th Lamar  or Parmer for Chip the way its meant to be.

Do yourself a favor and go to the new location on Anderson Ln instead. This location skimps on ingredients and is located in the terribly designed Arbor Walk shopping center. The 50 speed bumps  pedestrians that think they can just walk in front of moving cars  and lack of entrances exits make this one of the most frustrating shopping centers to navigate I ve ever been to.  P.S. don t even think about the salad dressing. It has 25  grams of fat ALONE. Pure oil.

ZERO IF I COULD    Got a gift card  never been there  love CRISPY TACOS  my Tex-Mex food of choice  NONE SERVED HERE. So I tried the  cafeteria system  soft tacos  ....two tries of take out  5 mins to home. Results  Big Mistake  Overpriced franchise  8. for 3 soggy bottoms falling out  a mushy mess  ....gag    I wouldn t eat there ever again if it were free  or....even if someone paid me. For no-brainer crispy tacos   other menu items  I totally prefer Taco Bell or Taco Cabana  not to mention much better real Mexican restaurants all over Austin. LD.

Sometimes it s hard to beat a big  tasty burrito.  I don t know who came up with the concept of the modern burrito  with rice  beans  cheese  specialty meats  and all the extra fixin s - but obviously  that person was a genius.  Since Chipotle burritos are custom made to your specs  let me give you my recommendation on the  1 best burrito that can be made from the ingredients Chipotle offers.  Here s what you tell the gal behind the counter  and yes  19 times out of 20  it will be a gal  and she will be a recent immigrant.  Chipotle is kind of old school in this regard.   -Burrito -Rice -Pinto Beans  for God s sake  trust me here  and deny that pesky black bean urge that you have.  -Barbacoa  that s the Mexican style shredded bbq beef  -Pico -Sour Cream -Cheese  you may have to ask for a touch extra  Lettuce Done   That means no corn salsa  or any of that other silly junk.    There you go.  That s a 100  Jonathan W. Approved and Guaranteed burrito  developed through years of experimentation.  Deviate from this formula at your own risk.  My take on the Chipotle concept  -- Chipotle  as you know  is a chain  at one time affiliated with the dreaded McDonald s Corp.  who has since divested its financial interest.   So if you hate McDonald s  rest assured that not one cent of Chipotle s profits go to the evil corporation.  Now  despite the fact that Chipotle is a chain  and that there are other specialty burrito chains  namely Freebirds and Q-doba  I feel that Chipotle offers a fairly unique product.  And they do so with remarkable consistency from location to location.  So  for better or worse  if you ve been to one Chipotle - you ve been to them all.  Which also means I will probably cut and paste the lion s share of this review for the many Chipotle locations I have visited  and intend to visit in the future.
had to come back and give them an extra star because the steak tacos were finally on point and the chips were great again but lost another star because the guac hasnt improved since my last visit.
Food is good here  but they really need to learn how to roll a burrito. Other burrito places do it much better

Watching calories can be done  and Chipotle is one of my favorite places to dine when I want to feel full but avoid a calorie binge. I choose the bowl and ditch the tortilla.  This is my bowl  -Rice -Black Beans  I ask for a little more beans and skip the onions pepper blend and corn relish  -Pico and a little of the medium hot sauce -Cheese -Guacamole -Lettuce Voila... a large amount of food for around 600 calories.   I ve never had problems with the employees at this location... partly because I anticipate the next question and SMILE when ordering.  The smile is usually returned and they throw on some more lettuce because they think i m a vegetarian a friend to bovines.  This seems to be the case at all locations... but i m also not a demanding guest looking for a long term relationship.    I d make the rice at home if I could find a comparable recipe.  Anyone have one
This crew and management rock  Always with smiles and cheerful attitudes  tasty food and they remember their repeat customers.

food is great but don t buy food online. i recently had a bad experience when buying online. they kept advertising free delivery. so i gave it a try. i normally drive there but i couldn t because of s business meeting. so i gave it try. 20 minutes later i checked back to see if order was on its way and come to find out the order was cancelled. i called chipotle and they told me i need to call doordash. the driver cancelled my order. i called doordash and they tell me its no their fault call chipotle. i call chipotle and they say no its doordash fault. i gave up  cancelled my meeting  drove up my self to pick it up. why offer online if they cant meet handle stuff like this. manager only gave one free burito but my coworker got nothing since i ordered two meals. never again

I ll never forget the first time I had Chipotle back in my college days in Northern Virginia. It was amazing and automatically one of my favorite things. The nice thing about Chiptole is for the most part the food is identical everywhere so you know what you are getting. When I come here  the staff is great. I come here during lunch and the lines are always kind of long but they move fast and the people are awesome. I m there probably once or twice a month and I don t plan on ever stopping
Very consistent quality service and food. Chipotle at Arbor Walk better managed than other Chipoltes I have been to.

I can only vouch for the veggie bowl at dinner time. It s all I ever get here. I love it. And they have great iced tea. Pros  fast service  fresh ingredients  outdoor seating  management seems to be on top of things. It s never busy when I ve been there for a late dinner. I guess that s probably not a good thing. Cons  location. I really dislike Arbor walk. It is hard to get in and out. And who decided to put speed bumps every 15 feet  yikes.  Also  they need to tone down the music - I don t like sitting inside because it s too loud. ...but I ll be back.

How can you be a burrito place and not have queso   Do I like their burritos  Yes  but not having queso is a travesty   Other cons  really thick chips  no  meal deal  type option  Freebirds and Qdoba both let you add chips and a drink for a minimal extra charge   the carnitas is really greasy
Not only a nice staff  always but I was sitting in enjoying my dinner and a deaf family walked in and they had An employee who signed  I was blown away how awesome that was. Love this location.

I went to Chipotle because their rewards system is ending soon and I wanted to claim my free chips and guac. The coupon wasn t showing up on my phone and I couldn t figure it out. Loren used a coupon code for me so I could get free chips and guac. It was super awesome of him to do that and things like that go a long way for me. This Chipotle always has great service and everyone is always really nice. I definitely recommend going to this location

I m personally a fan of Chipotle. I will say they don t have a huge variety of options  especially when it comes to added toppings in your burrito or salad. If you want all different kinds of veggies or options you may want to check out Freebirds. Every time I have got in the girls have been friendly. I will say that there has been a time that my burrito seemed a little on the  light  side when it comes to how they are normally made.

By far the best chipotle in Austin. Be warned  REEEEALLY BUSY during lunch  IBM  the Domain  and JJ Pickle are practically next door . But they got it taken care of  I ve never had less than 100  from them  and I ve seen some really weird crap go down in other parts of town. The produce must either have a really high turnover rate  or actually just be made well  or probably both.

This review is for this store only.  Every time I ve been to this Chipotle I wonder why I wasted my money here.  The chicken is never fresh and tastes funny and to add insult to injury they skimp on the toppings  compared to other Chipotles .  I ve marked this one off my list of places to eat cause it hasn t been good in a long time.  Save yourself the money and the trouble of coming here because there are much better places to eat.

The big guy at the beginning of the line was stingy with the rice and beans  so much so that I had to ask for a little more. Next he was cheap on the meat. I basically had a vegetarian bowl. Looks like this location has a history of skimping on the servings. Extremely disappointed and still hungry. Never coming back to this location.

I don t know how Chipotle does it  but I ve never had a bad experience there.  The Harvard Business School should do a case study on their management style  because they re doing a lot of things right.  I go to Chipotle often and I am amazed by their consistency.  It rivals the consistency of McDonalds  but nukes them out of the water on quality  value  service  healthiness  and taste.   This location is just as Great as the other   Keep up the good work   I am a big fan.

This is another really good Chipotle  but I almost never go here cuz I pass like 9 other Chipotles on the way.  They give you TONS of food  they have alcohol  and the people there are really nice.  I also really like how the seating is arranged.
I eat here at least once a week cause it s always health  good  fast  and in expensive.
If advertising organic products and gold ingredients means that you sell bland rubbish that doesn t even come close to being actual Mexican food..... then Chipotle has the market cornered.

I really enjoy ordering the bowl option instead of the burrito. It offers you more ingredients and less starch. The salsa is awesome and I always ask for a side of it to take home with me. This place rocks and the staff is very professional as well

The first time I went to this particular Chipotle  it was okay.  The last few times  it has disappointed me.  The employees seem distracted and unhappy to be at work.  I guess they want to take out that frustration on me  because they make the sloppiest soft tacos I ve ever seen   and they ve started totally skimping on the meat.  I get literally 1 2 as much as I get at the Mueller Chipotle.  The manager indicated that they cut the portion from 5oz to 4oz due to increased meat prices  but seriously  I got about 2 oz  they don t weigh it at all  so it s easy to under-serve people . To his credit the manager packed up a little ramekin of barbacoa for me to add to my burrito  but that really didn t make up for it.  You can t just disassemble and reassemble those things without damaging their structural integrity.  I hope another  better Chipotle opens in NW Austin because I think they make good food and this place doesn t do it justice.

I dont know what it is but all they cook here upsets my stomach... even the brown rice... I dont think I ll go back. I ve tried 3 times and always the same result  discomfort after lunch for like 7 hours.
I love the crispy tacos. Steak  pico  medium salsa  cheese  guacamole  and lettuce. With chips and medium salsa. Excellent food. Not five stars because the price is a little high.
The food was delicious. I ordered the Birria tacos can t wait to get more  I ll definitely be a regular.

I was craving Birria for weeks  and as you can imagine  my phone knew exactly what to surface in my direction. Saw a post from Birria Queen on my Facebook and immediately decided to check it out. I will say  I was a little shocked when I pulled up to the address and it was being served out of an apartment  but the food itself was fantastic. I ll definitely be back to get some tacos again

My lash lift lady recommended me to Birria Queen stating that this was the best birria place she has had in the city. We got the tacos  ramen  and grilled cheese. It was amazing  Very authentic tasting and delicious. FYI  it is cash only but completely worth it. My partner said that she is very nice and friendly. The Birria Queen lives up to her name  Don t have any photos because we devoured everything.

This is the best Birria taco I have ever had  Never judge a book by its cover  food was served out of an apartment window which might seem weird to some people.  But take a chance and you will be hooked  The lady who cooked and served was awesome and very nice    I will be back

Holy  hit this place is legit  Worth the drive from Liberty Hill  Birria was delicious but the consomm  was AMAZING  This queen knows what she s doing  I had the crispy and soft Birria tacos first time trying the soft and was not disappointed  100  Will be back  Hoping she caters
the birria ramen is something I dream about on the daily. Thank you BQ
Haven t been to Chipotle in a while. Did not want to cook today. This was a great substitution. I love the choices they provide. The chicken is tender and grilled. Love the veggies. Tasty

I m reading thru all the sad online reviews and how online orders are always wrong  well I d like to join y all in that misery except that I actually had the luxury of eating there in person this afternoon. First let me say that I was happy to see the trays fully stocked with food as I entered  It was ALMOST all downhill from there. As I m giving instructions on how to make my bowl  I tell the girl to add medium salsa which she did  but then she added mild salsa even though I didn t tell her to. I didn t say anything because I do like mild salsa so that s not going to ruin my meal but it s disappointing that she just added some crap that I didn t request. I then arrived at the register and asked for chips with my bowl and the guy on register didn t give me the chips  at least he was consistent and didn t charge me for them either so I decided not to make a big deal out of that blunder either. The food was decent-tasting and up to standard and that s how this location avoided getting a one star review from me. If the workers are making these kinds of mistakes with customers who are actually there telling them what to do then I can only imagine how large the mistakes are for online orders.

Sadly this may be the worst queso I ve ever consumed.  Something was off  it didn t really taste like cheese just some kinda sour after taste. Won t be back  if the queso is bad how can I trust anything else.

If i could give this chipotle 0 starts i would. I literally will never expect anything less than extremely rude and entitled people that work here. When you order tacos they throw all the tortillas on foil then dump the ingredients all over it. The way they package it up is by rolling all of the mess into foil.   So today i decided to ask them to put them in a tray since she had dumped the food all over the taco and no joke she rolls her eyes at me then looks at the girl at the register and starts talking sh t about me in Spanish not knowing both my husband and i speak fluent Spanish.   I can handle crappy food since it s chipotle but to be blatantly disrespected like that is insane. Get a new job if you hate it so bad.

I don t understand why people keep ordering from here. There are so many better options now. In a moment of weakness and working tons of overtime  I made the regretful decision to order another sad bowl of beans  rice and meat from this place. Just know  if you don t go in person to supervise the making of your bowl  IT WILL BE WRONG. This evening they just completely stopped after the carnitas and left out the salsa  corn  sour cream  cheese  and lettuce. Another sad  12 that I should have just spent at HEB or one of the restaurants next door.

In my many years of eating Chipotle  this is hands down the WORST location Chipotle meal I ve ever had. No doubt. I was so disappointed eating this that halfway through I decided this needed to be addressed for future customers.  I ve never had such large  clunky chunks of veggies or chicken at any other location. I ate an onion so large it might as well been an onion ring. This is harder to explain  but it felt oddly wet when I was eating it. Not wet as in coated perfectly with sauce  but wet like someone dumped water in it... something had excessive moisture in a bad way. Lastly  these were the smallest portion sizes I ve ever received. If I m charged by my meat choice and amount of meat  then I expect one full scoop  not a chunk of chicken that clearly wasn t cut properly.   Chipotle is a solid staple in my diet as it should be yours. Just do yourself a favor and go to another location. Otherwise it ll fail to stand up to its normal  delicious consistency. I m highly disappointed and will drive out of my way to get my Chipotle full at a more reliable location.

Where did the days go of friendly smiles and personable service  Now days not one single employee cares to be there. Sad times.  Not just a one time experience or it wouldn t be worth mentioning.  Portions were also pretty small compared to most other locations.
The food is great as always  the only problem is the parking for Mueller. That is the only drop in rating  but I ll still go for the great tacos and bowls

If you are gonna work  then you might as well perform your job correctly   Half the order is wrong  the Rewards points for free chips n salsa is missing and the driver didn t even get out of his lazy vehicle.  Cmon... Y all can do better than this for  22

The girl who charges you was so unnecessarily rude. I wish I asked for her name so I could call her out on this review  but I was so bewildered. She was rude out of no where. She asked me if that was all for my order and just pointed at the bag. I said yes because I thought they had put all my order in the bag so when I noticed she hadn t charged me for the other burrito  I told her and she responded  That s why I asked you if that was all.  Huh  Sorry you hate your job.
This location gives pretty skimpy servings. Other than that  it provides your standard Chipotle offerings and tastes just fine.

Don t order online using mobile app or Uber Eats app  because if like me  you will wait 75 minutes and order will end up being cancelled. If don t want business  why open restaurant at all  Management at this Chipotle location obviously doesn t care and needs to be fired bc looking back at other 1 star reviews  this problem has been happening for months if not years at this location.

worst chipotle ive been too  amp  ive been too all of them around austin round rock san marcos just horrible asked for veggies game me 5 strips of bell peppers asked for steak got 4 pieces of steak im not exaggerating

I tried to give this place so many chances to get it right  But every time I visit this specific location the service is absolute TRASH     The employees make ur burrito either skimpy as hell or when u ask for sour cream or red sauce they completely smother it  To the point I ve had to TRASH several burritos I paid almost  10 for. The employees don t greet you and always seem bothered to be there I understand the pay probably isn t that great but please don t take it out on good paying customers

I ve been to Chipotle location all across the country  visited hundreds of times  maybe thousands after 20  years now  and this is certainly one of the worst I ve ever been to. Unfortunately it s the one closest to my house.     I m finally having to call them out.   They re nice enough people  but this is just so poorly run. They re always short on things on the line  it s a mess  the person at cash doesn t know this or that  they give you barely any food  and it s cold  for an online order  etc. It s just something every single time. Where is the management for this place  The negative reviews I see are not surprising at all. Completely jives with my experience. Most unfortunate because as I said  this is the one I kind of have to go to if I want Chipotle.
Great  fast service. Best chipotle in the local area. I typically get 2-3 bowls and the staff are patient as I run through the order. The place is clean and staff are accommodating and kind.

This place always is terrible on their portion sizes and they are frequently closed during the middle of the days because they re  out of food .  How does chipotle run out of food    This location is terrible.  Totally clueless staff.
Wow this is the worst chipotle I ever eat .long line and they don t care customer and the food common I F paid 12 and they put just May be 7spoons food .   Be aware guys you have other place to eat

The place was very crowded due to a long line. People were not social distancing. The staff didn t care. They were also receiving a delivery and had boxes and boxes of food stacked outside. The delivery drive had to come through the line to deliver. He was on his phone and not being mindful of the people in line. We had to jump back to make sure he didn t hit us. The cooking area had multiple piles of dirty dishes and the door that led to where the delivery driver was going opened up to a filthy backroom.

Wherever I order via their app  they always manage to mess up the whole order. Instead of giving me light sour cream  they literally drowned my entire bowl in sour cream  it was probably the most sour cream I ve ever seen  and I had to try to salvage it by scooping globs of sour cream out. Instead of giving me extra corn  they give me NO corn. And they give me onions and peppers when I didn t even order any. I don t know how a chipotle bowl can get this messed up.

I had never really had bad customer service here until today. One of the ladies just seemed like she didn t want to serve me and she interrupted me while I was asking a question. I was in medical scrubs. Disrespectful. I hadn t had bad service here before by anyone else.

Open during covid and taking some precautions. Social distancing not truly enforced. Hand sanitizer at the door. Convenient to order online and walk in past the line for pick up. Can t really go wrong with Chipotle. Just wish the queso was better tasting  it s okay.

I do not know who is on the grill at this Chipotle tonight  but she he should immediately be moved. I love Chipotle and normally have no complaints  but this chicken is so  blackened  burnt  I can not enjoy it at all. I m beyond disappointed

Literally the worst Chipotle in Austin  slowest service and rude staff  I was in a rush and my food was sitting there for minutes getting cold while employees chit-chat about 4th period  when I asked if she could ring me up she got upset and threw a fit  no wonder they have the worst rating on Yelp

Watched them make someone else s order then ended up leaving. Half scoop serving sizes at best here. If you do decide to go make sure to not order online. Saw them making someone s online order and it was even less food. It s almost as if they are taking their bad day out on you. There is a free birds a few miles away that will at least give you the recommended serving size. I ll try this location out later on when they get different employees.

Went there to pick up mu lunch today. Usually i go to the downtown location. This place is quiet small compared to the that location. not much places to sit  especially if you are in a large group. Though they have a beautiful patio sitting. Which is awesome.  Food is always good here  maintaining their standards and quality throughout all location. Staff was very courteous  amp  friendly which definitely makes a customer happy. Service was super quick

On Halloween they had a bogo and i got two bowls. It was exactly what you d expect from Chipotle. Straight gas and the best part is you get twice as much gas for only half the price. This is one of the best Mexican places in the United States of America especially better than Cabo Bob s. Not sure why anyone would want Cabo Bob s when Chipotle is such gas. Cobo Bob s is not gas at all. If you do find yourself at Chipotle don t make the mistake of getting a burrito get a bowl with a tortilla side for a DIY burrito. That way you get more gas for a better price.

Came in today at 9 30 and they were out of chicken and told me it would take a long rime to cook   Super pissed and unacceptable Bc they close at ten   Decided to wait Bc this was the only option of food open . Evelio made everything okay she comped our meals and apologized    This being the only reason for the stars   Really hope she is the only one who gets the tip I personally handed to her she deserved it . Btw 4 more people showed up behind us and get to have dinner Bc we stayed and made them make the chicken    Way to go Evelio u made our night

Went for lunch. They are doing an excellent job at getting people in and out quickly and safely. Food was very good. Ate outside and tables were spaced  and customers all had masks and were being good citizens. Win win   Felt very safe and food was very good. Thanks

Best chipotle out there   They actually fill our bowls compared to other locations  Go to this one   I m telling you. Also  they have good customer service been here four times and each time was amazing.

I usually go to N Lamar for chipotle cause it s on my way to work but since I had a craving and I was around the place I decided to go there. I m still feeling angry at the condescending attitude from the employees and they were not even paying attention to me when I was saying my order  I had to repeat it at least 5 times and there was people behind me and the employees were acting like it was my fault even if I was telling them what I wanted VERY specifically. At the end one of the ladies told the cashier in Spanish  WHICH IS MY MOTHER LANGUAGE   to charge me quickly so I could get out of there  of course  using very very  colorful  and rude language that it seems she thought I couldn t understand BUT I DID . And the worst of all of this is that when I m already at home I get surprised by finding HAIRS ON MY FOOD  also pico de Gallo wasn t fresh at all.   So yeah  whoever wants to eat chipotle I recommend you to go anywhere else  there are many in the city  cause this location is a waste of space in such a good neighborhood
Horrible   To go orders were all scattered and didnt even try to put any food on my bowl. Never again at this location

Worst customer service ever. i love chipotle  but because of how i was treated here i will never visit a chipotle ever again. If these are the kind of people they hire then i dont even want to support them. I get better treatment at a McDonalds than here. Sorry but you have lost my patronage.

These dudes can t get an online order right  ever. I either have an incomplete delivery order when I use this location  or when I pick it up myself  I have to check the food in the parking lot to make sure it s right and then inevitably head back in to correct it. Never order double protein from this location because they will always miss it. If they made the mistake one or two times  I d be more understanding  but it s like 4 5 orders wrong and now I have to write a review.

I used  a href   redir url http 3A 2F 2FChipotle.com amp s adb2a28a82f8dfab3b8dbc80f2ed0ce63d8be8db20663ea81a232393f6706fc5  rel  nofollow  target  _blank  Chipotle.com  a  to get a delivery from this location.  The food arrived and half the order was missing. I called the location and was told they could  probably remake it  but would have to come pick it up myself.   If I wanted to go pick it up I would ve done so in the first place.  After being on hold and finally told the manager was  too busy  to talk to me  I just asked for a refund.  I was told I would have to go to  a href   redir url http 3A 2F 2FChipotle.com amp s adb2a28a82f8dfab3b8dbc80f2ed0ce63d8be8db20663ea81a232393f6706fc5  rel  nofollow  target  _blank  Chipotle.com  a  for that.  I could hear the manager telling her employee what to say... still wouldn t get on the phone with me.  It was so annoying and took up a lot of time we were trying to have for family night. Best part  I asked for the manager s name and was told  I don t know her name  maybe Maria.   Seriously     Totally disappointed.
Good service and food  I come to this chipotle regularly and have not been disappointed. The staff is friendly and meals are usually fulfilling.

So we re on a diet which means salad  salad and salad. So we ve been going to the chipotle on Lamar for chipotle salads but this one is closer so I suggested we try this one.  My boyfriend had been here before and was like no this one is terrible they don t listen to you. But I m like you went on a weekday when it was busy it s the weekend maybe it ll be great.  I was wrong - they don t listen.   They were a little busy but not crazy or busy by chipotle standards at all but it seemed like they were desperate to rush us through the line.   My boyfriend only wanted mild and corn but they put every salsa on and he tried to stop her but she literally wasn t listening. I was like do you want them to remake it  But we went with it  we got to cheese to ask for extra cheese. Cheese  Yes extra cheese. A second later - Cheese  Yes....extra cheese.  Plops on tinyest amount of cheese ever  uhm could we get extra cheese  Pushes bowl to register.   Back to Lamar

We debated driving to a location with a rating higher than 3 stars and ended up deciding against it  and now I wish we had. We were the only people in the store  were met with no greeting and then we proceeded to wait for ten minutes until someone would take our order. When we went to pay the cashier did not even bother me to wait at the register but instead went to the back of the store without offering my receipt. All three workers seemed to be in horrible moods and I would not recommend this location if you have the time to go anywhere else.
Honestly havent been disapointed yet  normally get the burrito and salad bowel  delivery can skimp on fillings but over all not bad

Chipotle is a guilty pleasure but I really do enjoy it. You can absolutely make the argument that it is not real Mexican food  but you know what I say to that    There is a time for authentic Mexican food  and there is a time for Chipotle.
